testcase.name: yatra.com Use case1 scenarios
testcase.system-out: Given User is already on yatra.com page.....................................passed Then User clicks on Hotels..................................................passed And User selects city as Jaipur.............................................passed And User selects Checkin and Checkout dates.................................passed Then User selects Travellers................................................passed And Clicks Search Hotels button.............................................passed Then Print Total number of Hotel records....................................passed

testcase.name: yatra.com Use case2 scenarios
testcase.system-out: Given User Selects Star rating as 5 Star....................................passed Then User Selects bottom of top 5 hotel.....................................passed Then User clicks Hotel and Print the price..................................passed And User Clicks on review tab...............................................passed When User choose room button and click on book now..........................passed Then User Verify the same price and hotel name..............................passed And User Verify the tariff details..........................................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
